data.title: Korea University Department of French Language and Literature
data.text: 1963 Establishment of the department with 20 admitted students / Appointment of Prof. Kwang-seon Park 1964 Appointment of Prof. Sook Jung Jung 1966 Appointment of Prof. Seong-wook Kang 1970 Appointment of Prof. Moon Kang Huh 1974 Appointment of Prof. Hwa-young Kim 1977 Change from department admission to admission by fields of studies 1981 Appointment of Prof. Joun-Seob Lee 1982 Reversion from admission by fields of studies to department admission / Increase in student quota to 80 / Appointment of Prof. Sung-Gi Jon 1989 Decrease in student quota to 50 1993 Appointment of Prof. Hieon San Hwang / Retirement of Prof. Moon Kang Huh 1994 Retirement of Prof. Sook Jung Jung 1995 Appointment of Prof. Chungryong Gang 1996 Retirement of Prof. Seong-wook Kang 1997 Appointment of Prof. Yeong-Houn Yi 1999 Change from department admission to college admission 2002 Change from college admission to school/division admission 2006 Retirement of Prof. Hwa-young Kim 2007 Retirement of Prof. Joun-Seob Lee 2008 Appointment of Prof. Jookyoung Sohn and Prof. Jaeryong Cho 2010 Appointment of Prof. Youngrae Ji 2010 Retirement of Prof. Hieon San Hwang 2012 Retirement of Prof. Sung-Gi Jon 2014 Change to admission to the Department of French Language and Literature (up to 38 students)
